lead_paragraph: Hillary Rodham Clinton gave a measured defense Monday of the Obama administration's controversial decision to swap five Guantanamo Bay detainees for a U.S. soldier held hostage in Afghanistan, noting that many of America's allies make similar deals.

headline.main: Hillary Rodham Clinton Defends Prisoner Swap
headline.print_headline: Hillary Rodham Clinton Defends Prisoner Swap
